text_logic_form: Find the area of the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $IH$ is $4$ units.
The point $I$ lies on the line $BE$.
The line $HI$ is perpendicular to the line $EB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $BE$, $BF$, $BI$, $CF$, $DE$, $EI$, $IH$, forming the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$.
